data.meta_description: Is the climate in North Battleford (in Canada) in november good? Discover the weather forecast in november 2024 to prepare your trip.

Best time to go to North Battleford?

The weather in North Battleford in the month of november comes from statistical datas on the past years. You can view the weather statistics for the whole month, but also by using the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in North Battleford in november

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in North Battleford in november.

The climate of North Battleford in november is very bad

the weather in North Battleford in november is rather dry (with 31mm of rainfall over 2 days). This is better than the previous month since in october it receives an average of 39mm of rainfall over 2 days.

The climate is very cold in that area november. Bring warm clothes!. The high seasonal norm is -2°C. The seasonal minimum is -7°C. Thus, the mean temperature average in november in North Battleford is -4°C. Note that these seasonal averages are in contrast with those observed in North Battleford in the month of november with a maximum record of 14°C in 2009 and a minimum record of -28°C in 2013. You can expect to have about 26 days with temperatures down below 0°C, or 87% of the month.

Day length in North Battleford in november is 08:42. The sun rises at 08:37 and sets at 17:19.

Weather data for North Battleford in november:

Weather data for North Battleford for november are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in North Battleford. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in North Battleford can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to North Battleford.
